entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
